i'll quote myself and maybe you can read it again. "Riot cant admit when they made a mistake, they openly said that they know the system is flawed and that it makes mistakes and they will not change the mistakes. oh well."

What mistake are you talking about? Who said the system is 'flawed'? This system is VERY accurate with an EXTREMELY LOW false positive rate. When we do find a false positive, which rarely happens, we are happy to reverse it.

This case looks pretty cut and dry to me. You were extremely toxic, and your behavior was absolutely unacceptable. Additionally you have had many previous punishments and warnings. You did not learn from your previous punishments, and were again punished. Your other account is on its final warning too.

When i can find the interview were the riot employee who said the system is flawed i'll be happy to post it, on top of that i was never punished multiple times, i was given a 10 game chat restriction and then permabanned. i wasnt banned for 2 weeks nor a 25 game chat ban, i never said they made a mistake with my toxiciness, i can fully admit i was wrong to rage, no excuse there. last time i checked though this is a game for adults, stated in your ToS and i do believe as an adult im allowed to swear, i also believe as a player who takes pride in playing this game and wants to win as many games as possible in ranked also should be able to express is dis pleasure in others specially when others are doing such things as trolling and being just as toxic.

> When i can find the interview were the riot employee who said the system is flawed i'll be happy to post it

Please do.

> on top of that i was never punished multiple times

You were banned for 2 weeks on this account before your perma-ban.

Your other account has had a 10 game chat restriction, 25 game chat restriction and a 14-day ban.

All of the punishments and warnings given were to tell you that your behavior is not acceptable. I am again telling you that your behavior is not acceptable. You seem to think that this is normal behavior and you should be able to exhibit it in game. This is not normal behavior. The vast majority of players will never see any sort of punishment, yet you have seen our systems many times over. You were even surprised when you received this recent punishment and actually believe you do not deserve it. I strongly encourage you to really take a look at your behavior and realize how it ruins the game for others, and only adds stress to yourself.

I can assure you, i was not banned 2 weeks on this account, i'm 100% sure i was never banned for 2 weeks nor was i even chat restricted for more then 10 games.

After looking for the thread i am unable to find the interview that a riot employee said the system is flawed, I will gladly apologies because i can not support my claim to that statement.
I do have a question for you though, IF an automated system that has less then 1% false positive rate is working the way it has intended then why after the system has made its decision need to have a riot employee verify? I will also apologies for the toxic behaviour that was shown in those games due to the stress of trying to win as many games as possiable before the season started. I know that raging shouldn't part of the game.

>I do have a question for you though, IF an automated system that has less then 1% false positive rate is working the way it has intended then why after the system has made its decision need to have a riot employee verify

Again, I'm not sure what you are talking about. You are given the evidence of your punishment when you login. You should be able to easily tell why you were punished, and that it was deserved.
so you are saying that a riotor does not verify any of the cases made by the automated system?

We do not manually verify all punishments by the system. We do periodically sample cases, and make sure the system is operating as intended. We do manually review cases when players write in. This is common knowledge, we've stated it many times.

I am still having a hard time understanding what you are getting at. The premise of your post was that the system is flawed, and Riot has said it's flawed. You admit that you were toxic, and presented chat logs showing your behavior. The system is not flawed. In fact you are an example of how the system is working. If the system were flawed, you would not have ever been punished.

All I can conclude is that you are now just trolling.

Last Modified: April 12, 2011
